France

France

In the ateliers of Paris, dessert is elevated to high art. French patisserie demands precision, respects tradition, and pursues perfection in every layer.

ButterVanillaChocolateCaramelCoffee

Mastered Sweets

Legendary desserts perfected over generations

Puff pastryCustardLayered

Mille-feuille

Thousands of layers of puff pastry with vanilla cream. A architectural marvel of butter and air.

FlakyCreamyButteryElegant
AlmondMeringueGanache

Macarons

Delicate almond meringue cookies with ganache or buttercream filling. Colorful, crisp, and chewy.

CrispChewyDelicateFlavorful
ChouxCustardChocolate

Éclairs

Choux pastry filled with cream and topped with glossy chocolate. A classic of French patisserie.

LightCreamyChocolateyRefined
CustardCaramelVanilla

Crème Brûlée

Rich custard with caramelized sugar top. The crack of the spoon is part of the experience.

CreamyCracklyRichVanilla
